config.title: Header Style 42

variables.menu_drop_font: 400 12px/1.35 Roboto, Helvetica Neue, Verdana, Arial, sans-serif
variables.menu_font: 600 13px/1.35 Roboto, Helvetica Neue, Verdana, Arial, sans-serif
variables.vermenu_font: 500 13px/1.35 Roboto, Helvetica Neue, Verdana, Arial, sans-serif

config.layout_xml:
<body> <!-- Layout --> <referenceContainer name="header.container" htmlClass="page-header header-style-42" /> <referenceContainer name="header-container-inner"> <container name="header-panel" htmlId="header-panel" htmlTag="div" htmlClass="header panel"> <container name="header-top" htmlId="header-top" before="-" htmlTag="div" htmlClass="header-top" /> <container name="header-middle" htmlId="header-middle" after="header-top" htmlTag="div" htmlClass="header-middle container" /> </container> </referenceContainer> <referenceContainer name="header-top"> <container name="header-top-panel" htmlTag="div" htmlClass="header-top-panel container"> <container name="header-top-row" htmlTag="div" htmlClass="header-top-row row"> <container name="header-top-left" htmlTag="div" htmlClass="col-sm-8 header-panel-left"> <block name="header-extra-text-1" class="Codazon\ThemeLayoutPro\Block\Header" template="Codazon_ThemeLayoutPro::layout/header-content.phtml"> <action method="setData"> <argument name="name" xsi:type="string">content_type</argument> <argument name="value" xsi:type="string">content_1</argument> </action> </block> <block name="header-extra-text-2" class="Codazon\ThemeLayoutPro\Block\Header" template="Codazon_ThemeLayoutPro::layout/header-content.phtml"> <action method="setData"> <argument name="name" xsi:type="string">content_type</argument> <argument name="value" xsi:type="string">content_2</argument> </action> </block> </container> <container name="header-top-right" htmlTag="div" htmlClass="col-sm-16 header-panel-right" /> </container> </container> </referenceContainer> <referenceContainer name="header.panel"> <container name="header-panel-row" htmlTag="div" htmlClass="header-panel-row row cdz-fix-left"> <container name="header-middle-left" htmlTag="div" htmlClass="col-sm-5 header-middle-left" /> <container name="header-middle-center" htmlTag="div" htmlClass="col-sm-14 header-middle-center" /> <container name="header-middle-right" htmlTag="div" htmlClass="col-sm-5 header-middle-right hidden-xs" /> <container name="header-search-wrap" htmlId="header-search-wrap" htmlTag="div" htmlClass="col-sm-24 header-search-wrap" /> </container> </referenceContainer> <referenceContainer name="header-middle-right"> <block class="Magento\Framework\View\Element\Template" name="links.features.search" template="Magento_Search::search-trigger.phtml" after="-"> <arguments> <argument name="html_class" xsi:type="string">search-link</argument> <argument name="wrapper_tag" xsi:type="string">div</argument> </arguments> </block> </referenceContainer> <move element="header.panel" destination="header-middle" /> <!-- End Layout -->
<!-- Top Right --> <referenceContainer name="header-top-right"> <block class="Magento\Store\Block\Switcher" name="header-switch-language" template="Magento_Store::switch/languages-style-02.phtml" /> <block class="Magento\Directory\Block\Currency" name="header-switch-currency" template="Magento_Directory::currency-style-02.phtml" /> </referenceContainer> <!-- End Top Right -->
<!-- Middle - Left --> <move element="logo" destination="header-middle-left" /> <!-- End Middle - Left -->
<!-- Middle - Right --> <move element="minicart" destination="header-top-right" before="-" /> <move element="top.links.features" destination="header-top-right" before="header-switch-language" /> <!-- End Middle - Right -->
<!-- Bottom --> <move element="catalog.topnav" destination="header-middle-center" before="-" /> <move element="store-menu-placeholder" destination="store.menu" /> <move element="mobi-cart-placeholder" destination="header-search-wrap" /> <move element="top.search" destination="header-search-wrap" /> <!-- End Bottom -->
<referenceBlock name="header-contact-link" remove="true" /> <referenceBlock name="top.links"> <action method="setData"> <argument name="name" xsi:type="string">css_class</argument> <argument name="value" xsi:type="string">header links visible-xs</argument> </action> </referenceBlock> </body>
config.content: {"content_1":"<div class=\"hot-line-wrapper\"><span class=\"msg-text\">Need Help? Call us now: <\/span> <a class=\"telephone\" href=\"tel:123455688719\">(123) 455688719<\/a><\/div>","content_2":""}
